latest:
**Critical**: 0-day vulnerability [6,7], Accounts hijacked [6,7]  

**Latest**: End User Separation EAP [2], trigger redaction [3], OAuth in Admin [3], WhatsApp Flows API [Zendesk Announcements]

**Meanwhile**: Former HQ to auction [1,4], Zendesk killer gets funding [Google News - Zendesk]
weekly:
**Critical**: 0-day vulnerability [1], Multiple pods: adherence issue (Jul 25) [2], QA assignments stuck (Aug 4) [3]

**This week**: TTEC and Zendesk partnership [1], dynamic filtering for lookups [2], WhatsApp Flows API [5], Exchange/Gmail import enhancements [7]

**Meanwhile**: Zendesk QA user management moved [9]
monthly:
**Critical**: QA access issues & 5xx errors [1], Account integration issue [8], Workflow disruptions [10], AI Agent delays [11]

**Meanwhile**: 'Zendesk killer' gets funding [2], Zendesk boosts support with GPT-5 [13], Expands to meet AI demand [14], Adopts outcome-based pricing [19]

release_notes.summary: Copilot: auto assist can now suggest existing macros to agents. AI Agents Advanced: improved dialogue builder UI for hiding/disabling parameter branches.

article.title: Release notes through 2025-08-22
article.description:
See our What's New for an overview of what was released last month.This week's release notes include:
Copilot
AI Agents Advanced
App Marketplace
Products with no updates this week
